title: One Hour of Magic
description: "You'll be mine, not his."The words echoed in Holly's mind, reminding her that she was still simply the spoils of an ancient, bitter contest between feuding brothers.It seemed a cruel twist of fate that, having lost her beloved Robert,she should now be dependent on his brother, Daniel, for a home and a job. Robert, who'd been full of light, love and laughter--while Daniel was dark, brooding and so very bitter.But Christmas on Long Island went right to the heart of things, and Holly began to learn what a very superficial judgment she'd made....
author: Melinda Cross
